    Toolbox

    Updated 03 Jan 2023

    These are the tools I'm using, the bits of code I'm copying and the books I'm reading. I'll do my best to keep this updated. Inspired by Sawyer Hollenshead.

    Apps and add-ons

    • Tweetbot (MacOS or iOS) — Twitter client, for Mac and iOS
    • Day One – Simple journalling. Possibly the nicest Markdown editor.
    • Transmit
    • Highlighted – Digitally highlighting physical books
    • Paprika – Recipe management and planning
    • Overcast – Podcasts
    • Reeder – RSS reader
    • Libby – Borrowing audiobooks from the library
    • Broadcast – Tweeting from my iPhone without being distracted by the feed.

    Online Tools

    • CodePen – Great for testing bits of code.
    • Hemingway – Online editor helps to make your writing “bold and clear”
